a.n: Lorren at the North Sea Jazz Club: Shades of Blue

p.k: With her relaxed, bright voice, vocalist Lorren has made her name on the Dutch jazz scene. In this 'Shades of Blue' concert, which was recorded at Amsterdam's North Sea Jazz Club, the vocalist knows how to entertain the audience.
p.d: With her relaxed, bright voice, vocalist Lorren has made her name on the Dutch jazz scene. Lorren grew up in a family of music fans: from a very early age, she developed a fondness for the music of her great jazz heroine, Ella Fitzgerald. Also Selah Sue, Adele and Amy Winehouse influenced this wonderful soul, jazz, and pop singer. Lorren knows how to transport her audience to infinity with her contemporary music stamp. In this 'Shades of Blue' concert, which was recorded at Amsterdam's North Sea Jazz Club, the vocalist knows how to entertain the audience. The combination of Lorrens wonderful voice, her solid band, and fantastic new songs guarantee a wonderful evening!
